Summary: First saw light moving from distance then craft stopped above me at T intersection in country and I sped off.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving back from a work trip about 4 years ago (about 5 hour drive .. do it regularly). i honestly can not pinpoint the year or month only that it was about 4 years ago and it was late at night. an odd light caught my eye in the distance over a road about 5 miles away as a bird flys that i later needed to travel. i turned down the road and the light was more distant but still to the east. it never looked like a plane in the way it moved and it was odd enough that i kept watching for it. it was almost if it shifted around rather than fly at normal speeds. then it was no longer in the distant east, it was directly ahead of me due south. i slowed down at the t intersection and looked up at it. it was stopped directly over me \ slightly ahead of me but only 100 feet off the ground....it was not moving \ stopped still and it was not a commercial plane\jet. it did have a lot of bright lights on it. it may have been round or angular it all happened very fast and i did not really stare at it except to see the bright lights had stopped above me. self preservation instincts took over and i rounded the corner and stepped on gas to get away from it. i thought maybe it was some new military craft and i was afraid that they may use me as target practice. it made no noise. since then i have talked to ex military people and no one knows of any craft that can do that. there are a few houses around the area. it is definitely unidentied flying object. i was probably the #1 sceptic in the world but now i know first hand they exist. i know planes and jets and never before or since have ever seen anything like this anywhere. no planes fly to the airports in that direction ever. they never would fly that low and they certainly would not stop above me and i have no explanation on how it was far east and then suddenly in front of me. it was not an illusion it literally stopped above my vehicle. this is the first i ever reported it and i know it does not help you much except i know they exist. for years i explained it to myself as an experimental military craft and part of me still believes this. i dont know what it was and i do not want my name mentioned anywhere ever. until this day i truly regret not stopping to see it better but at the same time i remember how frightening it was and i just wanted to get away from it.
